title: Improve Supports
body:
Supports are one of the roles where many people hate and looks down upon. And there's a good reason why people don't want it. Some are riot's issue. Some aren't. I'll be discussing most of the issues support players have.

- ADC

As a support, you're heavily reliant on your ADC for your laning phase. But there are times where your adc is trash and it really turns into a 1v2 lane. ADCs can sometimes be a bit too spoil and always expect their supports to die for them and all that stuff. When the supports do peel. The ADC doesn't say anything. When the support doesn't peel well for decent purposes (e.g. mana, ultimate cooldown, summoner spell cooldown, item cooldown) the ADC flames. Your team pays attention to the ADC and not you (the support) for helping them and thinking you did nothing.

- Laning Phase

Most supports, with a small exception of Shen. Has weak early laning phase because of mana. The only way to fix that, is either A) Biscuit delivery rune from inspiration, or B) get mana items. The biscuit delivery is very helpful but doesn't give you enough of those. And the second one requires gold. Most support players will take last chapter or Tear. But it requires gold. And your gold income items don't give you all that much. But since your ADC will flame most of the time for taking their cs no matter how trash they are. This could be an issue. ADCs just have to spend their resources for poking. while the support has to spend resources on poking AND healing/shielding. 

-Riot's Problem

With the removal of ultimate hat, which sorcery is a common primary rune for supports mostly due to summon aery. Ultimate reliant supports like Soraka, Lux, Karma, Jana, Sona, Thresh and many more are taken a hard hit. Ultimate hat was a prefered option for supports looking for a late game buff with their ultimate from 120 seconds to less than 60 that can help greatly in 1v1 (Lux and Thresh), or in laning phase (Karma), and most importantly, in Team Fights (Janna, Sona, Karma, Soraka, etc). And while the replaced rune, Nimbus Cloak can be effective on Rakan. That's pretty much it. The only other ultimate cooldown is presence of mind. But the only support that can wield its precision rune tree is lux. The other one that could be a tiny bit better is to reduce gold income items from 350 to 250. That means there's 250 left and supports can buy a full total of 5 potions instead of 3. Also, please buff gold generation items, they really do sort of suck.

replies.body: I play both ADC and support and completely disagree with this. Half of this sounds like an entitled rant blaming other players.

I don't think you play supports enough to know how trash lower-elo ADCs are when it comes to sportsmenship. Play with unranked or maybe bronze adc, and don't peel them. You'll find my statement above quite true to some.

I don't think you play league enough to know how trash players are in general when it comes to sportsmanship. People get famous in NA for getting repeatedly banned. And that's just NA. 

Trust me, I've seen a lot of shit in bot lane. I've seen Caits melee assassins, Jinxs ult full hp targets at point blank range, and Rakans get killed by their own E's, and this is just this season. 

Improving support isn't just giving you better ADCs though.
I never said it'll give you better ADCs. I think improving support's purpose is to make them scale better and not reliant on someone else  as a support in general.

Not sure if you've played supports... but these aren't the most right as I like to say.

1: The entire design of support and its champions was to either help the team/adc engage and(or) peel for them with shields and cc
due to this design, we are always reliant on an adc or carry. 
its not your fault the ad is on a 48 hour rakia rampage, but you are still obligated to make the best out of your situation, i've carried some shit adcs before in my life.

Meanwhile everyone is screaming for nerfs to {{champion:63}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:40}}

I don't play Brand. But Rakan has weak early laning phase. Many champions, {{champion:412}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} and many more can use their CC to stop grand entrance. As it takes 1 second before it actually knocks people airborne. 

Champions like {{champion:43}} can outrun Rakan during the 1 second windup time of grand entrance if they have their mobility. While {{champion:223}} can eat his allies to save the knockup and the charm. Janna, all you have to do is abuse her weak early game by making her waste mana.

Rakan does need a nerf though. He offers good mobility, decent damage, decent healing, and good cc. Literally everything, and h'es good at all of it while building ap tank. He's good at all of it, not average. He should either be average like a true jack of all trades, or trade out strength in certain areas for more in others. He has no clear weaknesses.

I have no comment on Janna, haven't vsed her enough recently.

As for Brand, he is immobile, learn to play around him.

Rakan is decent, everything but his Q sucks. They cost way too much mana for its value. Heck, I think a maxed out Fiora Q cost the same than a  Rakan tier 1 q. But you gotta respect grand entrance though. The other weakness for Rakan is simply banning Xayah. Although played with Miss Fortune. It is still quite uncommon for a Rakan player to play without Xayah primarily because of his E.
